text: Neckarsulm () is a city in the German state of Baden-Württemberg. It is part of the district of Heilbronn. Neckarsulm has about 26,400 inhabitants and is near Stuttgart. Schwarz Group, which operates the grocery retailers Lidl and Kaufland, is headquartered in Neckarsulm. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Baden-Württemberg
title: Neckarsulm
